Debug Mode.tooltip: Enables a debug overlay that can control the autopilot directly.

Neuro API URL.tooltip: The URL of the Neuro API server. The NEURO_SDK_WS_URL environment variable will be used if blank. Game must be restarted to take effect.

Manual Override.tooltip: Prevents the AI agent from controlling the ship while the player is piloting it. Use this setting if the game becomes unplayable otherwise.

Prevent Destructive Actions.tooltip: Prevents the AI agent from using destructive actions like ejecting, and allows player to abort commands. For if it's being a nuisance.

Dialogue Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro the dialogue text when the player interacts with a character.

Nomai Writing Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro the Nomai writing when the player reads it.

Ship Log Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro the ship log fact when the player unlocks new facts.

Death Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro context when the player dies.

Achievement Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro the context when the player unlocks an achievement.

Notification Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro the notification text shown in the HUD ('GHOST MATTER DETECTED NEARBY' etc).

Misc Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro miscellaneous context like roasting marshmallows, sleeping at campfires, etc.

Location Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro the location of the player when they enter or leave a sector (area around a plantet)

Signalscope Context.tooltip: Sends Neuro the signalscope signal when the player listens to it.

Scout Launcher (Neuro).tooltip: Enables Neuro to use the scout launcher

Scout Launcher (Manual Control).tooltip: Enables the player to use the scout launcher alongside Neuro
